page.title: 14RELIGION IN CODICOTE/WELWYN
page.content: Codicote has an Anglican Church (St. Giles). St. Giles has three Sunday Services and one on Wednesdays. It has a Sunday School and Pathfinder Group on Sundays. There are also house group meetings. Welwyn has three Churches - the Ebenezer Baptist Chapel which has two Sunday Services and a daily one; the Evangelical Church which has one Service on Sundays, plus Sunday School, Prayer meetings and Bible Study on Wednesdays; and the Anglican Church (St. Mary's) which has three Services on Sundays and one every weekday. There is also Junior Church and Prayer Groups. This Church prints a Parish Magazine.
